description:
Are you tired of submitting resume after resume to tech companies and hearing nothing but crickets?

We've been there.

We come from non-traditional background (the automotive industry + teaching kindergarten) and struggled to break into tech for years, too.

But we finally cracked the code.

And since then, we've:

  • Worked at companies like Apple, Samsung, Dell, and LinkedIn - as well as several VC-backed startups
  • Screened thousands of resumes in hiring people for our teams

So we know exactly what works - and what doesn't

Come along with us as we show you how tech recruiters actually read resumes. And how to craft a resume that WILL get you an interview at even the hottest tech companies.

The Insiders Guide to Tech Resumes - your start on the path to a dream job in tech
title: The Insider's Guide to Tech Resumes
